item.description:
Join colleague and friend, Rich Walkden and myself for an afternoon of sweet connection and diving into the subject of intimacy in social situations!

 

Both Rich and I actually spent years feeling awkward around large groups, parties, meetings....basically all things social (where the opportunity to connect is ripe and potentially juicy!)  Those of you that know me might find that hard to believe - but I was SO painfully shy!!!!  (I sometimes cannot believe it myself!)

 

During this more informal Meetup, we'll begin with a pot luck brunch from 12-1 pm and then gather for "Pathways To Intimacy" structured exercises and discussion.

 

Please note that Pathways To Intimacy is a Human Awareness Institute (HAI) sponsored Meetup group that meets every other month.  I produce the Meetup workshops - as HAI has been a big part of my growth and learning and I love sharing this deep wisdom (and practice) with others.

 

I welcome you to join me for some relaxed time together this Sunday afternoon!

 

Bring your friends! Bring your family! Bring a meal or non-alcoholic beverage to share.

 

Come enjoy the outside deck, sunshine, a yummy meal and conversation! RSVP required.

 

Warmly,

Pushana
item.name: Are You Savvy in the Social Scene? What is the Pathway to Intimacy?
